CONSULTANCY

Who we are

Age-Star is a prominent business process improvement and management consulting ﬁrm that assists ﬁrms in being considerably more efﬁcient, productive, and lucrative. We provide best-practice company optimization solutions for addressing process, technological, and organizational improvements. Age-Star promotes increased competitiveness through multifaceted interventions that lead to Business Improvement via consultancy, people, process, and operational evaluations, benchmarking, and resource supply via Quality Outsourcing. We carefully choose our consultants in order to provide our customers with the highest level of competence as well as deep knowledge of industry practices. Our experts have a proven track record of successfully completing large consulting projects requiring organization-wide deployment, multi- geography, and advisory mode for continuous process improvement.

Consulting Services

Age-Star is a valued consulting partner to businesses of all sizes, from small start-ups to huge, complicated Fortune 500 corporations. Age-Star works with enterprises in a variety of sectors to implement enterprise-wide process improvement and quality initiatives utilizing multiple models such as ISO Management System, Lean Six Sigma, Project Management from PMI, Risk Management, and HSE, to mention a few. Age-Star's products are aimed to assist ﬁrms in aligning their strategic objectives with day-to-day business and operational goals. Our services assist businesses in reducing cycle time, increasing productivity, and improving the quality of service delivery and operations.

Why Age Star

We recognize that company success begins with people. And we've worked with hundreds of ﬁrms, applying the necessary criteria to each, so we can really benchmark business success. We've also educated hundreds of people who use them in their professional lives, so we know we can swiftly take you from novice to Management System expert - no matter where you are in your learning path, we can adapt training to you and your organization.

Sustainability Consulting

Translating
Sustainability into Organizational terms

Strategic Sustainability Consulting equips businesses with the knowledge and resources they need to effectively manage their social and environmental consequences. We specialize in assisting under-resourced businesses in implementing long-term solutions that are often reserved for huge, international corporations.

  • Sustainabilty Advise
  • Research
  • Stakeholder Identifcation and Consulting
  • Project Management
  • Sustainabilty Reporting
  • GRI-Global Reporting Initative

Request for a Meeting

Over 700+ organizations, including all major Companies in Nigeria trust Age-Star as their General Contractor, Info Tech and Training Consulting Partner
